text: Hermine Karagheuz (2 December 1938 Paris - 30 April 2021 Paris) was a French- Armenian actress, writer and photographer. She debuted in 1967 in Monsieur Fugue . She was Eponime in the 1972 mini-series Les Miserables. == References == Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French actors
title: Hermine Karagheuz
